entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023
